name: EA SPORTS FC 26 [windows]
description: The latest installment in the world-renowned football simulation series, featuring updated rosters, advanced gameplay mechanics, and deep career and management modes.

name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare [windows]
description: A futuristic first-person shooter that takes the franchise into space, featuring a grand-scale war between the United Nations Space Alliance and the Settlement Defense Front.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered [windows]
description: A high-definition remaster of the classic 2007 title, featuring improved textures, rendering, and high-dynamic range lighting while keeping the original's acclaimed gameplay.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 Campaign Remastered [windows]
description: A completely remastered version of the blockbuster 2009 single-player campaign, featuring improved animations, physical rendering, and updated audio.
